evidence.claim: CERENOVUS utilizes an HL7 FHIR API for interoperable health data exchange.
The company's products adhere to HIPAA compliance standards for secure health information exchange.
Cerenovus promotes technical integration with various EHR systems, ensuring smooth data flow.
Event-driven architecture utilizing cloud services for data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found for X12 use cases related to healthcare data exchange.
